sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import {connect } from 'react-redux' import './collection.styles.scss' import CustomButton from '../CustomButton/customButton.component' import { AddItem } from '../../redux/cart/cart.action' const CollectionItem =({item}) =>(
{name} {price} Add To Cart
) const mapDispatchToProps =dispatch =>({ AddItem: item =>dispatch(AddItem(item)) }) export default connect(null,mapDispatchToProps)(CollectionItem)
